description:
Fire faces a fierce battle as Demon King Azul evolves into Evil Lord Azul! Data is up against Evil Sea King Tatsudon as Gantetsu and Stream Knight Flow team up with the Lone Swordsman Dante to fight Evil Vice Admiral Fisca.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Battle Royal in the Evil Depths of the Ocean! Dante`s Decision
魔海大乱戦! ダンテの決意
